CustomField.description: Concatenates the Account Health fields that are set to At Risk.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(X401k_S125_Account_Health__c, "At Risk") , "401K;","") & IF(ISPICKVAL(TAA_Account_Health__c, "At Risk") , "TAA;","") & IF(ISPICKVAL(MMS_Account_Health__c, "At Risk") , "Preview;","") & IF(ISPICKVAL(Premier_Account_Health__c, "At Risk") , "HR Solutions;","") & IF(ISPICKVAL( HR_Essentials_Account_Health__c , "At Risk") , "HR Essentials;","")& IF(ISPICKVAL(HRO_Account_Health__c, "At Risk") , "HRO;","")& IF(ISPICKVAL( Icon_Account_Health__c , "At Risk") , "Icon;","")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Concatenates the Account Health fields that are set to At Risk.
CustomField.label: At Risk
